alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lafayette (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 4:16PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lafayette and northwestern Calhoun Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 416 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Paris, or 11 miles southeast of Oxford, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oxford, Tula, Denmark, Cambridge, Paris, College Hill Station, Altus, Keel, Lafayette Springs, Delay and Yocona. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
